messages.subject: 4th Annual Samurai Fiction Contest - 2008
messages.msgSnippet: At long last, the 4th annual Samurai Fiction contest has kicked off. This year there is NO FEE to join, and anyone can enter. Please check here for details:
messages.messageBody:
At long last, the 4th annual Samurai Fiction contest has kicked off.
This year there is NO FEE to join, and anyone can enter.

Please check here for details:

http://www.samurai-archives.com/writcon2.html

Deadline for fiction submission: 7/15/2008
Judging starts: 7/20/2008
Judging ends: 8/01/2008 or until necessary
Winner to be announced after judging.
